  • Constructor Details

    • Market

      public Market​(Marble[][] board, Marble slide)
      Customized constructor
      Parameters:
      board - the market board
      slide - the single marble

    • Market

      public Market()
      Default constructor. Puts 4 white marbles, 2 blue marbles, 2 grey marbles, 2 yellow marbles, 2 purple marbles and 1 red marble in the market's board by a random order

    • selectRow

      public int selectRow​(int numRow, Adder adder) throws InvalidOperationException, LastRoundException
      This method draw all the marbles in the selected row
      Parameters:
      numRow - the row's number
      adder - the player's interface
      Returns:
      the number of white marbles drawn
      Throws:
      InvalidOperationException - if the numRow is less than 0 or more than 3
      LastRoundException - if the player reaches the end of his faithPath

    • selectColumn

      public int selectColumn​(int numColumn, Adder adder) throws LastRoundException, InvalidOperationException
      This method draw all the marbles in the selected column
      Parameters:
      numColumn - the column's number
      adder - the player's interface
      Returns:
      the number of white marbles drawn
      Throws:
      LastRoundException - if the numColumn is less than 0 or more than 4
      InvalidOperationException - if the player reaches the end of his faithPath
